content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Due to the number of projects, and the variety of product lines and stakeholders we interact with, we’ve defined Portfolios that include one-to-many projects of a similar nature.  Within Liberty, we’ve identified 6 larger Portfolios including GRS Claims, GDAAP (Global Data & Advanced Analytics), GRM, LSM (Liberty Specialty Markets), Surety and Cloud.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A Portfolio is a number of projects, grouped by the same department of Liberty Mutual as a requestor AND/OR same key stakeholder. At the moment, 7 portfolios exist:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":54014,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/732eb5c4-4687-4aed-9632-d5794e14ea7e/Capthhhhhhhure.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/732eb5c4-4687-4aed-9632-d5794e14ea7e/Capthhhhhhhure.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Capthhhhhhhure.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capthhhhhhhure.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"732eb5c4-4687-4aed-9632-d5794e14ea7e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":426},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Management Organization Structure\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When staffed, it is important to know who to go to with questions or concerns.  For each area of work there is a Program Manager and Delivery Director/Supervisor.  This is a group to ask questions and offer suggestions/improvements for what we could do better.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":48894,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/29a199a1-126a-43f5-96c6-547066e6c638/kooooo.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/29a199a1-126a-43f5-96c6-547066e6c638/kooooo.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"kooooo.PNG\",\"name\":\"kooooo.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"29a199a1-126a-43f5-96c6-547066e6c638\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":427.7865168539326},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
